ygData.subject: Re: Please help
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I m very new also but I can answer one of your questions.  The Flasks of Water are just the standard water you can get form vendors.  Make sure not to use
ygData.messageBody:
Well I'm very new also but I can answer one of your questions. The Flasks
of Water are just the standard water you can get form vendors. Make sure
not to use conjoured water from clerics/shamans that won't work.

Are there any FAQ's?
Thanks

On Sun, 2 May 1999, Albert J.Newkirk wrote:

> From: "Albert J.Newkirk" <ajamax@...>
>
> Level 19 character, completely new to smithing, seeks advice on what items
> he make. I can't remember right away what my skill level is at(very low,
> only the max a half elf ranger can be trained to by the guildmaster in
> Surefall Glade), but cleaning rusty weapons does not raise skill. Can
> someone tell me where I can find flasks of water, and is it possible to use
> bottles of water instead? Any advice would be greatly appreciated.
>
> Thank you all
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Looking for an easy, effective way to research an important topic?
> http://www.onelist.com
